shipping_info_text.0: The delivery will be made to the shipping address indicated by the customer.
shipping_info_text.1: The delivery time is 3-5 working days. We send packages from Monday to Friday; legal holidays are considered non-working days.
shipping_info_text.2: The calculation of the delivery days begins after the delivery confirmation is sent. In case a product is no longer available or for any other reason cannot be sent we will send you a notification.
shipping_info_text.3: For the custom jewelry, the delivery time is up to 15-20 working days.

to_shipping_and_return: For more information go to SHIPPING AND RETURN page.
